00041 #define PRE_ACTION_SIG "preAction(BrisaInArgument*const,BrisaAction*const,QString&)"
00042 #define POST_ACTION_SIG "postAction(BrisaInArgument*const,BrisaOutArgument*const,BrisaAction*const,QString&)"
00043 #define FAILURE_ACTION_SIG "handleActionFailure(BrisaInArgument*const,BrisaAction*const,QString&)"
00044 #define ACTION_IN "(BrisaInArgument*const,BrisaAction*const)"
00045 #define ACTION_OUT "BrisaOutArgument*"
00046 #define PRE_ACTION_OUT "int"
00047 #define POST_ACTION_OUT "int"
00048 #define FAILURE_ACTION_OUT "int"

00053 static const QString SOAP_ERROR_TEMPLATE = "<?xml version=\"1.0\"  encoding=\"utf-8\"?>\r\n"
00054                                            "<s:Envelope xmlns:s=\"http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/\""
00055                                            "s:encodingStyle=\"http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/\">\r\n"
00056                                            "<s:Body>\r\n"
00057                                            "<s:Fault>\r\n"
00058                                            "<faultcode>s:Client</faultcode>\r\n"
00059                                            "<faultstring>UPnPError</faultstring>\r\n"
00060                                            "<detail>\r\n"
00061                                            "<UPnPError xmlns=\"urn:schemas-upnp-org:control-1-0\">\r\n"
00062                                            "<errorCode>%1</errorCode>\r\n"
00063                                            "<errorDescription>%2</errorDescription>\r\n"
00064                                            "</UPnPError>\r\n"
00065                                            "</detail>\r\n"
00066                                            "</s:Fault>\r\n"
00067                                            "</s:Body>\r\n"
00068                                            "</s:Envelope>\r\n";

00085 BrisaService::~BrisaService() {
00086     delete webService;
00087 
00088     for (QMap<QString, BrisaWebService *>::iterator i = childWebServices.begin(); i != childWebServices.end(); ++i) {
00089         delete i.value();
00090     }
00091     childWebServices.clear();
00092 }

00094 void BrisaService::call(const QString &method, BrisaInArgument &param) {
00095     // TODO: Improve this by using a QMap of type <QString, BrisaAction*> (action_name, action instance) to fastly
00096     // find an action, instead of make a looping and comparisons. For this, it is necessary to change the type of the
00097     // BrisaAbstractService::actionList attribute to QMap<QString, BrisaAction*>, current it is a QList<BrisaAction*>.
00098     for (QList<BrisaAction *>::iterator i = this->actionList.begin(); i != actionList.end(); ++i) {
00099                 BrisaAction *action = *i;
00100         if (action->getName() == method) {
00101             int prePostActionReturn = 0;
00102                         QString errorDescription = "";
00103                         // executing preMethod if available
00104             if (this->preActionMethod.methodIndex() >= 0) {
00105                 if (!this->preActionMethod.invoke(this,
00106                                                   Qt::DirectConnection,
00107                                                   Q_RETURN_ARG(int, prePostActionReturn),
00108                                                   Q_ARG(BrisaInArgument *, &param),
00109                                                   Q_ARG(BrisaAction *, action),
00110                                                   Q_ARG(QString, errorDescription)))
00111                 {
00112                     qDebug() << "Error invoking preAction method. Continuing...";
00113                 }
00114             } else {
00115                 qDebug() << "Warning: preAction method not found, continuing...";
00116             }
00117 
00118             if (prePostActionReturn == 0) {
00119                 // call the action
00120                 BrisaOutArgument *outArguments;
00121 
00122                 if (!action->call(&param, outArguments)) {
00123                     qDebug() << "An error has occurred during the " << action->getName() << " callback.";
00124                                         if (!outArguments) {
00125                                                 delete outArguments;
00126                                         }
00127 
00128                         if (this->handleActionFailureMethod.methodIndex() >= 0) {
00129                                                 int handleFailureActionMethodReturn = 0;
00130                                 if (!this->handleActionFailureMethod.invoke(this,
00131                                                                                         Qt::DirectConnection,
00132                                                                                 Q_RETURN_ARG(int, handleFailureActionMethodReturn),
00133                                                                                         Q_ARG(BrisaInArgument *, &param),
00134                                                                                 Q_ARG(BrisaAction *, action),
00135                                                                                 Q_ARG(QString, errorDescription)))
00136                                 {
00137                                 qDebug() << "Error invoking handleActionFailure method. Continuing...";
00138                                 this->respondError(UPNP_ACTION_FAILED);
00139                                                         return;
00140                                                 }
00141                                                 this->respondError(handleFailureActionMethodReturn, "Error specified by UPnP vendor: " + errorDescription);
00142                                                 return;
00143                                         }
00144 
00145                     qDebug() << "handleActionFailure method not implemented in service, returning default error.";
00146                     this->respondError(UPNP_ACTION_FAILED);
00147                                         return;
00148                 }
00149 
00150                                 // avoiding segmentation fault...
00151                                 if (!outArguments) {
00152                         outArguments = new BrisaOutArgument();
00153                                 }
00154 
00155                                 // executing postMethod if available
00156                 if (this->postActionMethod.methodIndex() >= 0) {
00157                     if (!this->postActionMethod.invoke(this,
00158                                                        Qt::DirectConnection,
00159                                                        Q_RETURN_ARG(int, prePostActionReturn),
00160                                                        Q_ARG(BrisaInArgument *, &param),
00161                                                        Q_ARG(BrisaOutArgument *, outArguments),
00162                                                        Q_ARG(BrisaAction *, action),
00163                                                        Q_ARG(QString, errorDescription)))
00164                     {
00165                         qDebug() << "Error invoking postAction method.";
00166                     }
00167 
00168                                         if (prePostActionReturn != 0) {
00169                         qDebug() << "Warning: postAction service method returned non-zero, sending UPnP error code " << prePostActionReturn;
00170                                                 delete outArguments;
00171                                                 this->respondError(prePostActionReturn, errorDescription);
00172                                                 return;
00173                     }
00174                 } else {
00175                     qDebug() << "Warning: postAction method not found, continuing...";
00176                 }
00177 
00178                 // send response.
00179                 this->respondAction(action->getName(), outArguments);
00180                 delete outArguments;
00181                 return;
00182             } else { // preAction returned non-zero
00183                 qDebug() << "Warning: preAction method returned non-zero value, it returned " << prePostActionReturn << " with description " << errorDescription;
00184                                 this->respondError(prePostActionReturn, errorDescription);
00185                                 return;
00186                         }
00187         }
00188     }
00189 
00190     qDebug() << "BrisaService: Unknown callback: " << method;
00191     this->respondError(UPNP_INVALID_ACTION);
00192 }

00202 void BrisaService::buildWebServiceTree(QxtAbstractWebSessionManager *sessionManager) {
00203     webService = new BrisaWebServiceProvider(sessionManager, this);
00204 
00205     BrisaWebService *control = new BrisaWebService(sessionManager, this);
00206     webService->addService(controlUrl.section('/', -1), control);
00207 
00208     BrisaEventController *event = new BrisaEventController(sessionManager,
00209                                                            &this->stateVariableList,
00210                                                            this);
00211     webService->addService(eventSubUrl.section('/', -1), event);
00212 
00213     webService->addFile(scpdUrl.section('/', -1), scpdFilePath);
00214 
00215     QObject::connect(control,
00216                      SIGNAL(genericRequestReceived(const QString &,
00217                                                    const QMultiHash<QString, QString> &,
00218                                                    const QByteArray &,
00219                                                    int,
00220                                                    int)),
00221                      this,
00222                      SLOT(parseGenericRequest(const QString &,
00223                                               const QMultiHash<QString, QString> &,
00224                                               const QByteArray &,
00225                                               int,
00226                                               int))
00227                     );
00228 
00229     childWebServices.insert(controlUrl.section('/', -1), control);
00230     childWebServices.insert(eventSubUrl.section('/', -1), event);
00231 
00232     this->parseDescriptionFile();
00233 }

00235 #endif

00237 BrisaStateVariable *BrisaService::getVariable(const QString &variableName) {
00238     for (QList<BrisaStateVariable *>::iterator i =
00239             this->stateVariableList.begin(); i != this->stateVariableList.end(); ++i) {
00240         if ((*i)->getAttribute(BrisaStateVariable::Name) == variableName)
00241             return *i;
00242     }
00243 
00244     return 0;
00245 }

00247 BrisaWebServiceProvider *BrisaService::getWebService() {
00248     return webService;
00249 }

00251 void BrisaService::parseGenericRequest(const QString &method, const QMultiHash<
00252         QString, QString> &headers, const QByteArray &requestContent,
00253         int sessionId, int requestId) {
00254     Q_UNUSED(headers);
00255     Q_UNUSED(sessionId);
00256     Q_UNUSED(requestId);
00257 
00258     if (method != "POST")
00259         return;
00260 
00261     BrisaActionXmlParser actionXmlParser;
00262 
00263     actionXmlParser.setXmlContent(requestContent);
00264 
00265     if (actionXmlParser.parseSOAP()) {
00266         //If servicetype is incorrect
00267         if (actionXmlParser.serviceType != serviceType)
00268             return;
00269 
00270         this->call(actionXmlParser.method, actionXmlParser.args);
00271     } else {
00272         qDebug() << "BrisaService: Invalid SOAP xml format.";
00273         this->respondError(UPNP_INVALID_ACTION);
00274     }
00275 }
00276 
00277 void BrisaService::respondAction(const QString &actionName, const BrisaOutArgument *outArgs) {
00278     QByteArray message("<?xml version=\"1.0\"  encoding=\"utf-8\"?>\r\n"
00279                        "<s:Envelope xmlns:s=\"http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/\""
00280                        "s:encodingStyle=\"http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/\">\r\n"
00281                        "<s:Body>\r\n"
00282                        "<u:" + actionName.toUtf8() + "Response xmlns:u=\"" + serviceType.toUtf8() + "\">\r\n");
00283 
00284     for (QMap<QString, QString>::const_iterator i = outArgs->begin(); i != outArgs->end(); ++i) {
00285         message.append("<" + i.key() + ">" + i.value() + "</" + i.key()
00286                 + ">\r\n");
00287     }
00288 
00289     message.append("</u:" + actionName + "Response>\r\n"
00290         "</s:Body>\r\n"
00291         "</s:Envelope>\r\n");
00292     childWebServices.value(controlUrl.section('/', -1))->respond(message);
00293 
00294     qDebug() << "BrisaService finished responding action.";
00295 }
00296 
00297 void BrisaService::respondError(int errorCode, QString errorDescription) {
00298         if (errorDescription == "") {
00299                 errorDescription = this->errorCodeToString(errorCode);
00300         }
00301     QString message = SOAP_ERROR_TEMPLATE.arg(QString::number(errorCode),
00302                                               this->errorCodeToString(errorCode));
00303 
00304     childWebServices.value(controlUrl.section('/', -1))->respond(message.toUtf8());
00305 }

00311 QString BrisaService::getDescriptionFile() {

00315 void BrisaService::parseDescriptionFile() {
00316     if (this->scpdFilePath.isEmpty())
00317         return;
00318 
00319     // TODO: Change this to only pass the file (this->scdpFilePath) and make the 
00320     // BrisaServiceXMLHandler class open the file when parseService method
00321     // is called.
00322     QFile file;
00323     file.setFileName(this->scpdFilePath);
00324     file.open(QIODevice::ReadOnly | QIODevice::Text);
00325 
00326     BrisaServiceXMLHandler *serviceXMLHandler = new BrisaServiceXMLHandler();
00327     serviceXMLHandler->parseService(this, &file);
00328     delete serviceXMLHandler;
00329 
00330     file.close();
00331 
00332     this->bindActionsToServiceMethods();
00333     this->connectVariablesEventSignals();
00334     this->setDefaultValues();
00335 }
00336 
00337 void BrisaService::connectVariablesEventSignals() {
00338     BrisaEventController *event = dynamic_cast<BrisaEventController *>
00339                                                                         (childWebServices.value(eventSubUrl.section('/', -1)));
00340 
00341     if (!event) {
00342         return;
00343         }
00344 
00345     foreach (BrisaStateVariable *stateVar, this->stateVariableList) {
00346         if (stateVar->sendEventsChange()) {
00347             QObject::connect(stateVar,
00348                              SIGNAL(changed(BrisaStateVariable *)),
00349                              event,
00350                              SLOT(variableChanged(BrisaStateVariable *)));
00351         }
00352     }
00353 }
00354 
00355 void BrisaService::setDefaultValues() {
00356     foreach (BrisaStateVariable *stateVar, this->stateVariableList) {
00357         stateVar->setAttribute(BrisaStateVariable::Value, stateVar->getAttribute(BrisaStateVariable::DefaultValue));
00358     }
00359 }
00360 
00361 void BrisaService::bindActionsToServiceMethods() {
00362     const QMetaObject *meta = this->metaObject();
00363         QMetaMethod method;
00364 
00365         // binding preAction method
00366     int methodIndex = meta->indexOfMethod(PRE_ACTION_SIG);
00367     if (methodIndex >= 0) {
00368                 method = meta->method(methodIndex);
00369                 if (strcmp(method.typeName(), PRE_ACTION_OUT) == 0) {
00370                         this->preActionMethod = method;
00371                         qDebug() << "Binding method " << PRE_ACTION_SIG << " of service ID " << this->serviceId;
00372                 }
00373     }
00374 
00375         // binding postAction method
00376     methodIndex = meta->indexOfMethod(POST_ACTION_SIG);
00377     if (methodIndex >= 0) {
00378                 method = meta->method(methodIndex);
00379                 if (strcmp(method.typeName(), POST_ACTION_OUT) == 0) {
00380                         this->postActionMethod = method;
00381                         qDebug() << "Binding method " << POST_ACTION_SIG << " of service ID " << this->serviceId;
00382                 }
00383     }
00384 
00385         // binding handleActionFailure method
00386     methodIndex = meta->indexOfMethod(FAILURE_ACTION_SIG);
00387     if (methodIndex >= 0) {
00388                 method = meta->method(methodIndex);
00389                 if (strcmp(method.typeName(), FAILURE_ACTION_OUT) == 0) {
00390                         this->handleActionFailureMethod = method;
00391                         qDebug() << "Binding method " << FAILURE_ACTION_SIG << " of service ID " << this->serviceId;
00392                 }
00393     }
00394 
00395         // binding service actions methods
00396     for (QList<BrisaAction *>::iterator i = this->actionList.begin(); i != actionList.end(); ++i) {
00397                 BrisaAction *action = *i;
00398         QString actionName = action->getName();
00399         QString methodName = actionName.toLower();
00400 
00401                 int methodIndex = meta->indexOfMethod(qPrintable(methodName + ACTION_IN));
00402 
00403         if (methodIndex < 0) {
00404                 qDebug() << "Error: no method named " << methodName << " was found in the "
00405                      << "specified service class definition that matches with expected "
00406                          << "signature " << ACTION_OUT << " " << methodName << ACTION_IN << "."
00407                                          << "It was not possible to bind action " << actionName << " to "
00408                                          << methodName;
00409                         continue;
00410             }
00411     
00412             QMetaMethod method = meta->method(methodIndex);
00413             if (strcmp(method.typeName(), ACTION_OUT) == 0) {
00414                         qDebug() << "Binding method " << methodName << " of service ID " << this->serviceId
00415                                          << " to service action " << actionName;
00416                         action->setMethod(method, this);
00417             } else {
00418                         qDebug() << "Error: method named " << methodName << " has wrong prototype. "
00419                                  << "It is expected a method prototype that matches with the prototype "
00420                          << "'" << ACTION_OUT << " " << methodName << ACTION_IN << "'. It was "
00421                          << "found a method with prototype '" << method.typeName()
00422                          << " " << methodName << ACTION_IN;
00423                 }
00424         }
00425 }
